de.mpg.biochem.mars.fx.plot.tools

Class MarsRegionSelectionPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gsi.chart.plugins.ChartPlugin
      • de.mpg.biochem.mars.fx.plot.tools.MarsRegionSelectionPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MarsPlotPlugin

    public class MarsRegionSelectionPlugin
extends de.gsi.chart.plugins.ChartPlugin
implements MarsPlotPlugin
    Region along X or Y axis. Region selection start - triggered on MOUSE_PRESSED event that is accepted by getregionInMouseFilter() region-in filter. It shows a rectangle determining the region once mouse button is released.
    Author:
    Karl Duderstadt

      • setRegionSelectionMouseFilter

        public void setRegionSelectionMouseFilter(java.util.function.Predicate<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> regionSelectionMouseFilter)
        Sets filter on MouseEvent#DRAG_DETECTED DRAG_DETECTED events that should start region-in operation.
        Parameters:
        regionSelectionMouseFilter - the filter to accept region-in mouse event. If null then any DRAG_DETECTED event will start region-in operation. By default it's set to defaultregionInMouseFilter.
